Near-duplicate of q_4_0658 in same batch. Question '교원이 유튜브 활동을 하려면 어떻게 해야 하나요' is essentially identical to q_4_0658 '교사가 유튜브 활동을 하려면 어떤 절차가 필요한가요' (교원=교사, same intent). Same sources, overlapping answer content.

Question-answer mismatch: question asks '신청 자격이 있는 사람은 누구인가요' (who is eligible to apply) but answer only describes 허가기준 standards, never identifying eligible persons. Also duplicate answer of q_4_0666.

Question-answer mismatch: question asks '몇 년까지 가능한가요' (how many years) but answer never mentions any duration. The actual period (1년 이내, from page 290 line 26) is absent from the answer. Also duplicate answer of q_4_0666.
Question-answer mismatch: question asks '최근 변경사항이 있나요' (recent changes) but answer never addresses what changed. Just dumps the same 허가기준 content. Also duplicate answer of q_4_0666/0667/0668.
